titlestmt.titleproper: Register of the John G. Veneman papers, 1959-1981
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Aparna Mukherjee

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2016-02-08T08:24-0800

change.item: Declassified materials returned to collection by Sarah Patton.
Revised to update encoding and add unitid.
PUBLIC "-//Stanford University::Hoover Institution Archives//TEXT (US::CSt-H::::John G. Veneman Papers)//EN" "reg_197.sgm" converted from EAD 1.0 to 2002 by v1to02.cdl.xsl (2004-09-16).

did.abstract: Correspondence, speeches, memoranda, reports, clippings, sound recordings, and photographs relating to domestic political issues in the United States, especially welfare and social policy, and to national and California state politics.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], John G. Veneman papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1982.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

eventgrp.event: Served with United States Naval Reserve

chronitem.event: Elected to the Empire School District Board
Chairman, Stanislaus County Board of Supervisors
Under Secretary, Department of Health, Education and Welfare, Washington, D.C.
Conducted a course on welfare programs, New School of Social Research, New York City, New York
Lecturer, Eagleton Institute of Politics, Rutgers University
President, Veneman Associates, San Francisco, California
Served as Counselor to Vice President Nelson Rockefeller, Washington, D.C.
Vice President and Manager, Braun and Company, Washington, D.C.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, speeches, memoranda, reports, clippings, sound recordings, and photographs relating to domestic political issues in the United States, especially welfare and social policy, and to national and California state politics.

controlaccess.corpname: United States. Dept. of Health, Education and Welfare.
controlaccess.subject: Public welfare--United States.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Appointment books, business papers, certificates, financial records, guest list, interview, medical records, note books, passport application, printed matter, profile, receipt for papers, remarks about John Veneman, scrapbooks, telephone messages, travel records and miscellany, arranged alphabetically by physical form.

did.unittitle: Remarks about John G. Veneman by others

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Letters arranged alphabetically by correspondent. Includes a few letters neither from nor to John Veneman.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Articles, comments, notes, outlines, remarks, statements, speeches, and testimony, arranged chronologically by title. Typescripts unless otherwise noted.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Clippings, comments, correspondence, cost assessment, curriculum vitae, fact sheets, memoranda, messages, minutes of meetings, notes, pamphlets, press conferences, press releases, printed matter, remarks, report, statements, telephone logs, and writings by others relating to the years John Veneman was associated with the White House. It also includes papers relating to the domestic policy agenda under President Gerald Ford and his State of the Union address.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes declassified records returned to file after February 2016 release by Hoover.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes declassified records returned to file after February 2016 release by Hoover.

scopecontent.p: Includes declassified records returned to file after February 2016 release by Hoover.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Folders 5, 6, 8, 9, 11, and 12 include declassified records returned to file after February 2016 release by Hoover.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Folders 1, 2, 4, 5, 9, 10, and 12 include declassified records returned to file after February 2016 release by Hoover.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Assembly bills, clippings, correspondence, financial records, memoranda, minutes of meetings, newsletter, pamphlet, printed matter, proposal, remarks, reports, statements and miscellany, arranged alphabetically by subject.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Clippings relating to the appointment of Ralph M. Brown of Modesto, California as judge of a district appeals court in Fresno and the controversy surrounding the call of a special election to fill the vacant Assembly seat, the democratic candidate Charles Spencer who ran against John Veneman for Assembly from Stanislaus County, special election of 1962, speeches and activities of Assemblyman John Veneman, and his appointment and years of service as Under Secretary in the Department of Health, Education and Welfare.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: 22 sound cassettes of John Veneman's interviews on television and his speeches before various political, medical, and business groups on the issues of health care and welfare.

Speech, National Council of State Welfare Administrators,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: 36 prints depicting John Veneman with William Coleman, Robert Dole, Gerald Ford, Marjorie Lynch, Bob Monagan, Rogers Morton, Ronald Reagan, John B. Rhinelander, Elliot Richardson, Nelson Rockefeller, Stuart Spencer, and Spencer Williams, and 1 print of Richard Nixon addressing the 1976 Republican National Convention.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes 2 depicting Rockefeller speaking before an audience; 1 print of Rockefeller with his wife; 3 prints of Rockefeller with John Veneman; 2 prints of Rockefeller with Robert Dole; and 1 print of Rockefeller with Elliot Richardson.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes 4 depicting Veneman with President Gerald Ford, Ronald Reagan, Spencer Williams, Bob Monagan, Rogers Morton; 1 print of Veneman with Mrs. Nelson Rockefeller; 1 print of Veneman with Stuart Spencer at a reception for Russian and American atheletes at the State Department; and 1 print of Veneman in a meeting with William Coleman, Marjorie Lynch, John B. Rhinelander and Nelson Rockefeller.

did.unittitle: 1 print depicting Richard Nixon speaking at the Republican National Convention,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Print is signed by Nixon, commending Veneman for his outstanding contribution to the success of the Convention.

did.unittitle: 9 prints of John Veneman with other unidentified individuals and 1 print depicting him with another person,
